data.question: What is the title of the article?
data.answer: Tetra(2-oxopyridinato)chloroditechnitium. A new compound with a technetium-technetium bond of order 3.5 and a remarkable vibronic absorption spectrum

data.question: In which journal was the article published?
data.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society
